AbortEnvironmentUpdate.name: AbortEnvironmentUpdate
AbortEnvironmentUpdate.description:
Grants permission to cancel in-progress environment configuration update or application
                                                version deployment.

AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Elastic Beanstalk resource and to update tag values.

ApplyEnvironmentManagedAction.name: ApplyEnvironmentManagedAction
ApplyEnvironmentManagedAction.description: Grants permission to apply a scheduled managed action immediately.

AssociateEnvironmentOperationsRole.name: AssociateEnvironmentOperationsRole
AssociateEnvironmentOperationsRole.description: Grants permission to associate an operations role with an environment.

CheckDNSAvailability.name: CheckDNSAvailability
CheckDNSAvailability.description: Grants permission to check CNAME availability.

ComposeEnvironments.name: ComposeEnvironments
ComposeEnvironments.description:
Grants permission to create or update a group of environments, each running a separate
                                                component of a single application.

CreateApplication.name: CreateApplication
CreateApplication.description: Grants permission to create a new application.

CreateApplicationVersion.name: CreateApplicationVersion
CreateApplicationVersion.description: Grants permission to create an application version for an application.

CreateConfigurationTemplate.name: CreateConfigurationTemplate
CreateConfigurationTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a configuration template.

CreateEnvironment.name: CreateEnvironment
CreateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to launch an environment for an application.

CreatePlatformVersion.name: CreatePlatformVersion
CreatePlatformVersion.description: Grants permission to create a new version of a custom platform.

CreateStorageLocation.name: CreateStorageLocation
CreateStorageLocation.description: Grants permission to create the Amazon S3 storage location for the account.

DeleteApplication.name: DeleteApplication
DeleteApplication.description:
Grants permission to delete an application along with all associated versions and
                                                configurations.

DeleteApplicationVersion.name: DeleteApplicationVersion
DeleteApplicationVersion.description: Grants permission to delete an application version from an application.

DeleteConfigurationTemplate.name: DeleteConfigurationTemplate
DeleteConfigurationTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a configuration template.

DeleteEnvironmentConfiguration.name: DeleteEnvironmentConfiguration
DeleteEnvironmentConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the draft configuration associated with the running environment.

DeletePlatformVersion.name: DeletePlatformVersion
DeletePlatformVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a version of a custom platform.

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of account attributes, including resource quotas.

DescribeApplicationVersions.name: DescribeApplicationVersions
DescribeApplicationVersions.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of application versions stored in an AWS Elastic
                                                Beanstalk storage bucket.

DescribeApplications.name: DescribeApplications
DescribeApplications.description: Grants permission to retrieve the descriptions of existing applications.

DescribeConfigurationOptions.name: DescribeConfigurationOptions
DescribeConfigurationOptions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptions of environment configuration options.

DescribeConfigurationSettings.name: DescribeConfigurationSettings
DescribeConfigurationSettings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a description of the settings for a configuration set.

DescribeEnvironmentHealth.name: DescribeEnvironmentHealth
DescribeEnvironmentHealth.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the overall health of an environment.

DescribeEnvironmentManagedActionHistory.name: DescribeEnvironmentManagedActionHistory
DescribeEnvironmentManagedActionHistory.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of an environment's completed and failed managed
                                                actions.

DescribeEnvironmentManagedActions.name: DescribeEnvironmentManagedActions
DescribeEnvironmentManagedActions.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of an environment's upcoming and in-progress
                                                managed actions.

DescribeEnvironmentResources.name: DescribeEnvironmentResources
DescribeEnvironmentResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS resources for an environment.

DescribeEnvironments.name: DescribeEnvironments
DescribeEnvironments.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptions for existing environments.

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of event descriptions matching a set of criteria.

DescribeInstancesHealth.name: DescribeInstancesHealth
DescribeInstancesHealth.description:
Grants permission to retrieve more detailed information about the health of environment
                                                instances.

DescribePlatformVersion.name: DescribePlatformVersion
DescribePlatformVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve a description of a platform version.

DisassociateEnvironmentOperationsRole.name: DisassociateEnvironmentOperationsRole
DisassociateEnvironmentOperationsRole.description: Grants permission to disassociate an operations role with an environment.

ListAvailableSolutionStacks.name: ListAvailableSolutionStacks
ListAvailableSolutionStacks.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the available solution stack names.

ListPlatformBranches.name: ListPlatformBranches
ListPlatformBranches.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the available platform branches.

ListPlatformVersions.name: ListPlatformVersions
ListPlatformVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the available platforms.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags of an Elastic Beanstalk resource.

PutInstanceStatistics.name: PutInstanceStatistics
PutInstanceStatistics.description: Grants permission to submit instance statistics for enhanced health.

RebuildEnvironment.name: RebuildEnvironment
RebuildEnvironment.description:
Grants permission to delete and recreate all of the AWS resources for an environment
                                                and to force a restart.

RemoveTags.name: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Elastic Beanstalk resource.

RequestEnvironmentInfo.name: RequestEnvironmentInfo
RequestEnvironmentInfo.description: Grants permission to initiate a request to compile information of the deployed environment.

RestartAppServer.name: RestartAppServer
RestartAppServer.description:
Grants permission to request an environment to restart the application container server
                                                running on each Amazon EC2 instance.

RetrieveEnvironmentInfo.name: RetrieveEnvironmentInfo
RetrieveEnvironmentInfo.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the compiled information from a RequestEnvironmentInfo
                                                request.

SwapEnvironmentCNAMEs.name: SwapEnvironmentCNAMEs
SwapEnvironmentCNAMEs.description: Grants permission to swap the CNAMEs of two environments.

TerminateEnvironment.name: TerminateEnvironment
TerminateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to terminate an environment.

UpdateApplication.name: UpdateApplication
UpdateApplication.description: Grants permission to update an application with specified properties.

UpdateApplicationResourceLifecycle.name: UpdateApplicationResourceLifecycle
UpdateApplicationResourceLifecycle.description:
Grants permission to update the application version lifecycle policy associated with
                                                the application.

UpdateApplicationVersion.name: UpdateApplicationVersion
UpdateApplicationVersion.description: Grants permission to update an application version with specified properties.

UpdateConfigurationTemplate.name: UpdateConfigurationTemplate
UpdateConfigurationTemplate.description:
Grants permission to update a configuration template with specified properties or
                                                configuration option values.

UpdateEnvironment.name: UpdateEnvironment
UpdateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to update an environment.

ValidateConfigurationSettings.name: ValidateConfigurationSettings
ValidateConfigurationSettings.description:
Grants permission to check the validity of a set of configuration settings for a configuration
                                                template or an environment.
